question: I have had type one diabetes for 8 months I quit taking my Insulin for two months now I use meth everyday and watch my diet and my blood sugar stays between 100 and 130 does the method act as an Insulin because when I was taking my Insulin and using meth sometimes my blood sugar would go way low and I don't have a problem with it going to low it gets too high I know this sounds stupid but its doing something
title: meth and diabetes
